issue.title: List of search criterias scope not updated after selection
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

In the administrator view allowing catalog's search criterias management, when a scope is selected in the dropdown list, this list is not updated accordingly.
It is supposed to proposed only the value not selected, but after a selection its content is not updated.


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
